changelog.release_notes: Added simple animation to the bars when watchface is first displayed and at the end of every minute.

First version.
The font used in this version is the public domain Bowman font (see http://www.fontspace.com/bowman/bowman).

data.description:
Pebble watchface showing the time and date as a series of bars.
From top to bottom the bars represent:
 - Hours
 - Minutes
 - Seconds
 - Day of Week
 - Day of Month
 - Month
 - Battery Percentage Remaining
If your Pebble watch loses its Bluetooth connection to your phone the bars change to hollow rectangles.
Day of week and month are shown in the currently selected language.

latest_release.release_notes: Added simple animation to the bars when watchface is first displayed and at the end of every minute.

data.title: Bar Time

data.author: Tea

data.author: JoRy

changelog.release_notes: Bugfix & Updated for Pebble watch firmware 4.0.1.
Minor improvement.
Fixed bug - Sunrise & Sunset data missing for some users.
Added option to light watch up all the time on AC power.
Added DAILY STEPS GOAL - specific vibration pattern when you reach your daily steps goal (1000-20000 steps a day).
Sun data are refreshed as soon as you save Settings if enabled and then during the day.
Added option to show Sunset & Sunrise time instead of Sleep/Deep sleep time.

Less radio communication overall, more battery saving I hope.
Also, weather is now cached on watch for some time and not refreshed every watchface startup (less radio comm. also).

Few power consumption related improvements.
- Hourly vibration added.
- New icon for Steps data (replaced word "steps").
- Distance (in Kilometers/Miles) can be enabled in Settings next to steps count.

Added Hungarian localization.
Build with latest Pebble firmware.

Bugfix release. One byte less and you can't sleep for more than 10 hours :-) fixed.
Also, weather FORECAST can't be launched during sleep.
And, sorry for forum issues (WEBSITE LINK in app store) - Pebble migrated forum and something went wrong. Description of watchface disappeared and moreover I can't edit this post.
New option to hide battery power level with symbol above for watchface designs without numbers.
Battery icon behaviour changed - shows only when battery is under 10%.
PT/PTS numbers show/hide config is now persistent.

New Option to hide numbers even for PT/PTS.
PTR got this design option few weeks ago.

Forecast loading will not start when no BT connection.
Fixed one memory leak related to seconds hand & config refresh.

Bugfix release related to Forecast & Watchface is not responding message.
Never happened to me though.
Fixed minor bug caused crash for some users.
Thanks Mike for feedback about forecast loading animation not in center on PTR.
Minor improvement about WU forecast data.

data.description:
ModernNew.

Optimized for power saving. Localizations and many more can be configured in Settings including Yr.no/WU weather providers, Forecast, Health and so. Basic watchface is for free, but Settings is a paid feature. You can read more about it in Settings.

Pebble HEALTH: When watch detect that you're sleeping, watchface decrease display update cycle & weather update to conserve more battery energy. ENABLE it in app Settings, it is DISABLED by default.

Please READ the WEBSITE LINK down below for more info and more detailed description of watchface and all functions.

latest_release.release_notes: Bugfix & Updated for Pebble watch firmware 4.0.1.

data.title: Modern New

data.description:
Free

==Overview==
Inspired by the smartwatch from The Division; now you can rock your Pebble like an agent!

==Features==
-12 / 24 hour time
-US / EU date format
-BT Disconnect Vibration & BT Icon
-Battery level
-Low Battery use (A Rating)
-Imperial / Metric units
-Temperature & Condition
-Weather powered by OpenWeatherMap* or Weather Underground*
-Line Graph to show your step progress thoughout the past 7 days
-Daily Step counter next to the line graph
-Turning off the weather allows you to choose an emblem from 5 factions in The Division or go Rogue
-Quick View Compatible
-Master Key Support (pmkey.xyz)

-Languages: English, Español, Deutsch, Nederlands, Français, Italiano

Remember to leave a ❤ if you enjoy using The Division!
Credits to NiVZ78 for providing some assets.

*An API key from openweathermap.org or wunderground.com is required enable weather features. It's free to register.
data.title: The Division

data.description:
Welcome to Fair N Square, my very first watchface!
You can customize everything. The only limit is your imagination.

== Features ==
-12h / 24h support. (Choose under your Pebble Date & Time settings)
-Date
-Low battery use
-Customize background color, individual foreground color, individual digit color and date color! The possibilities are endless!
-8 different foreground graphics to mix and choose to your liking!
-Need some inspiration? Take a look at some of the examples above!

If you like this watchface, give it a heart!
Enjoy!

Major release, added optional forecast ticker, stock ticker or U.S. Stock index ticker.   All stock prices update once every 30 minutes (same as weather), and ticker displays on flick of wrist.
bug fix
add option to create & save pins daily (default), hourly, or on every update.  Just to set expectations, if hourly is selected, a new pin will be created each hour, and updated each half hour.
create a separate weather pin each day

data.description:
Choices of weather provider = Open Weather or Weather Underground if you have your own API key.  

Every time a weather update is made, a timeline pin will be created containing weather details.  

Specify up to three "Shake Action"s for a choice of weather ticker, stock ticker, a U.S. Stock Index ticker, or a Headline ticker currently offering a choice of 7 different RSS news feeds from Yahoo.  The top three stories from the RSS feed will be rotated.

The 2nd and 3rd shake actions will occur if shake occurs while a ticker is still running.  If you make the 1st shake action = "none", it will require two shakes to invoke the 2nd action.  This will save battery life if you find that the 1st action is triggered too frequently.

Other features include Pebble Health steps, and a horizontal line styled battery meter.

If you're not interested in seeing steps, then disable Pebble Health and you'll instead see high/low temperatures.

Custom colors allowed for all features.

Inspired by Luis Bento's Timeboxed watchface.

latest_release.release_notes: remove degree symbol on watchface if temp > 99; reduce logging

First Release. Comments are welcomed at support@chatopus.com.

data.description:
A big and clear watchface to show your current step count and whether you are more active than yesterday!

Try to keep an up arrow throughout the whole day! It's fun and it's motivating to be active.

For example, if you current step count is 9225 at 10:20pm today and your yesterday step count was 9137 at the same time yesterday, you would see an up arrow with a positive change of 88. However, once you stop being active, you may turn to a down arrow later in the day.

Design & Programming Copyright © 2016 Nev Rawlins

data.author: Dr. David Brown

changelog.release_notes: Initial release. Text-based watchface that displays date, time, astrological sign, lunar phase and the planet associated with the day of the week. Also displays battery level and bluetooth status indicators. Vibrates on bluetooth disconnect.

data.description:
Astrological is a text-based watchface showing:
* Date
* Time
* Sun Sign
* Lunar Phase (as text)
* Planet associated with Day of Week
* Equinoxes and Solstices
* Battery Level Indicator
* Bluetooth Connection Status

Lunar Phase is shown as one of 8 phases:
* New Moon
* Waxing Crescent
* First Quarter
* Waxing Gibbous
* Full Moon
* Waning Gibbous
* Third Quarter
* Waning Crescent

The traditional planets associated with the days of the week are:
* Sunday - Sun
* Monday - Moon
* Tuesday - Mars
* Wednesday - Mercury
* Thursday - Jupiter
* Friday - Venus
* Saturday - Saturn

The day of week display is replaced on equinoxes and solstices as follows:
* March 20-22 - Vernal Equinox
* June 20-22 - Summer Solstice
* September 20-22 - Autumnal Equinox
* December 20-22- Winter Solstice

The watchface also vibrates on bluetooth disconnect.

latest_release.release_notes: Initial release. Text-based watchface that displays date, time, astrological sign, lunar phase and the planet associated with the day of the week. Also displays battery level and bluetooth status indicators. Vibrates on bluetooth disconnect.

data.title: Astrological

data.author: lwsbrcly

changelog.release_notes:

Version 1
Has everything on it. Why is configuration set-up so hard?

data.description:
Duodecimal Time
- available for the first time on Pebble as an analogue watch face. Includes the digital representation (plus bonus digital "decimal" time!)

- First hand - Rotates once per day. Midnight is straight down, sunrise on the left, noon is straight up and sunset on the right. 
- Second hand - Rotates 12 times quicker than the previous hand. i.e. 1 rotation = 2 decimal hours. 
- Third hand - Rotates 12 times quicker than the previous hand. i.e. 1 rotation = 10 decimal minutes. 
- Fourth hand - Rotates 12 times quicker than the previous hand. i.e. 1 rotation = 50 decimal seconds. 

There will be future versions with configuration, to show/hide the hands and digital parts. Maybe even some colour options!
data.title: Duodecimal

data.description:
Analog watchface with time blocks appearing to sit on 3 sides of a cube that appears to be expanding.  

As you look at the face, the "inner" blocks form an A or P shape representing AM and PM.   The next (blue) blocks represent hours, the next (green) blocks minutes and the "outer" (red) blocks seconds.

Count the "lit" (brighter) time blocks.


Note.  When Quick Views occur, the second display is not shown until the Quick View ends.


Screenshots:  
(1) 11:05:56 AM
(2)   5:25:09 PM
(3)   8:48:27 AM
(4) 11:59 AM (with Quick View)


Designed by Peter Fletcher, who has designed watches for Tokyoflash and a number of the faces I have published.  The watchface has been produced with the designer and is published with his permission.

data.author: James Fowler
data.description:
I love the standard Pebble Tic-Toc watchface with all the nice animations, but I wanted to know bluetooth and battery status without spoiling the uncluttered simplicity.

On this version the hour hand shades from green through to red as the battery discharges; the 12 O'Clock dot disappears when the bluetooth is disconnected and it vibes when bluetooth comes and goes.

Thanks to lastfuture with Pebble-Time-Watchface-Super-Simple and Pebble themselves.
data.title: My TicToc

data.author: S3anD
data.description:
This skull watch face was created to keep my mind sharp.  The time is read with the numbers with 0 as 9, 1 as 8, 2 as 7, 3 as 6, ​4 as 5, 5 as 4, 6 as 3, 7 as 2, 8 as 1, and 9 as 0.  So in the pictures it is 3:25 and 15:26, respectively.

You can find the other version with regular number if you click the MORE FROM THIS DEVELOPER button at the bottom.
data.title: Skull Time

data.author: S3anD
data.description:
This watchface is based off of the writing system used in the video game Fez.  Time is in the center, 3 letter month in the top left, day number in the top right, battery percentage in the bottom left, and 3 letter week day in the bottom right.
  Here are links on how to read the numbers and the alphabet, respectively:
http://www.ign.com/wikis/fez/Fez_Numbers
http://www.ign.com/wikis/fez/Fez_Alphabet

12 hour and 24 times are supported.
data.title: Fezian Time

data.description:
Pebble steps into the health market by providing a health monitoring. Under the cover – assuming the function is enabled in the pebble health app settings – algorithms detect steps, more vigorous movements resulting in a higher VMC value, sleep as well as restful sleep phases. Active as well as restful calories consumption are tracked too.

The new Watchface provides all this data to you put into configurable views or graphs. It’s up to you, what values over the time are interesting for you - just configure your personal view.

Moreover the step count over the day is shown rated by a (funny) icon showing you e.g. a pig or fat cat, in case a low step count was measured. Just think about it. ;)

Or your calories consumption over the day is shown rated by a meal that corresponds to it. Try to make a buger menu every day! ;)

In addition the weather of your current location or a preconfigured fixed location is always shown. 

Also the time, the date in nearly any language is provided. Russian support was added lastly.

latest_release.release_notes:
* added emery support
* added heart beat additional panel for diorite as well as emery
* a lot of improvements and bugfixes

data.title: HealthWatch

data.description:
Analog watch face with a couple of differences.

First, the hands float away from the center and are identified by their width, length and color. 
- Hour: widest, shortest and red
- Minute: middle sized and blue
- Second: narrowest, longest and green

Second, the watch runs backwards - with the hands rotating anti-clockwise.  Hence the name.

The center circle is a full gray circle for AM and a ring for PM.

The background can be configured to black or white and the seconds can be switched off.

Screenshots: 
(1)    9:35:10AM
(2)    1:00:45AM
(3)    4:06:25PM
(4)    5:05AM (no seconds)
(5)    2:35:48PM (Quick View)


Design & Programming Copyright © 2016 Nev Rawlins

latest_release.release_notes: Bug fix: number 6 (text) was appearing too low.

data.title: Backwards

data.description:
Watchface for Master Masons featuring a background of a square and compass enclosing the letter G. The analog watchface marks the hour with a square, the minute with a triangle and the seconds with a circle. 

When the seconds marker (circle - mercury) coincides with the minute marker (triangle - sulfur), the G becomes an eye. When the seconds marker coincides with the hour marker (square - salt), the G becomes an uroboros.

The current lunar phase, sun sign, the planet associated with the current day of the week, the bluetooth status and battery levels are shown without text or numbers achieving a practical but purely symbolic watchface.

The watchface vibrates on bluetooth disconnect.

latest_release.release_notes: Version 1.2 supports color second, minute and hour indicators for color-capable watches other than Pebble Round.

data.title: Masonic

data.description:
I wanted a very minimal watch face that tries to be intuitive, hope you like it! 

The face shows:
 - Hour in 24hr format in the centre of the screen
 - Minute denoted by a red dot, on the edge of the dial
 - Steps and distance figures, alternating every ten seconds
 - A yellow arc denoting battery life
 - A blue/green arc denoting steps against average

The battery arc runs from the 9pm position to the top.  Hence when the battery is full, the arc runs between 9 and 12.  

The green blue arc represents current steps against your daily average (based on last 7 days), so an arc running between 12 and 3 positions shows you have acheived 100% of your average.  A lighter arc running between 3 and 6 positions will show that you have acheived up to 200% of your average.  Anything over this will not be shown.

Through configuration, you can change:
 - Colours for all elements
 - Choose 12hr or 24hr display
 - Larger text for hours
 - Wider arcs
 - Enable/disable battery monitoring
 - Enable/disable health monitoring
 - Change frequency for steps/distance change over
 - Configure which information is shown (None/Steps/Distance/Steps+Distance)
 - Configure distance units (miles/km)
 - Add steps target
 - Configure whether the health arc shows percentage of the target or the daily average
data.title: Minimal

data.description:
A watchface that's built and designed for pebble classic firmware 2.9. 

This watchface displays all the information you need to know about the date, including: 
- Analog clock 
- Digital clock (only 24hr display available, but will be fixed hopefully soon!)
- Date 
- Weekday

Show the status for:
- Bluetooth Connection
- Charging & Battery status
- Motion light status

About Motion Light:
It automatically turns on motion to light during the hour from 10pm to 8am. You can see if the motion detection is on or off by looking at the lightbulb icon on the top-left corner. 

Enjoy!!

data.description:
7 KiB is a simple and power efficient watchface.

Inspired by Watch-Only Mode introduced in Firmware 3.9, this watchface was created by following (and adapting) the CloudPebble watchface tutorial.

The name comes from its size: 7 KiB = 6 KiB resources + 1 KiB binary.

I would like to thank Le Fauve for helping me out with the code.

latest_release.release_notes: Version compatible with all Pebbles running on Firmware 3.8 or newer.

data.title: 7 KiB
